languages.text: {n}В вашей руке, как ни странно, — рука. Откушенная кисть друкари, сжимающая компактное ксеносское устройство, похожее на пульт. Застывший палец раздавил одну из двух кнопок.{/n}
{n}In your hand, oddly enough, is a hand. A bitten-off Drukhari hand clutching a compact xenos device resembling a remote control. The stiff finger is pressing one of the two buttons.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В вашей руке, как ни странно, — рука. Откушенная кисть друкари, сжимающая компактное ксеносское устройство, похожее на пульт. Застывший палец раздавил одну из двух кнопок.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In your hand, oddly enough, is a hand. A bitten-off Drukhari hand clutching a compact xenos device resembling a remote control. The stiff finger is pressing one of the two buttons.{/n}
{n}In your hand, oddly enough, is a hand. A bitten-off Drukhari hand clutching a compact xenos device resembling a remote control. The stiff finger is pressing one of the two buttons.{/n}
{n}In your hand, oddly enough, is a hand. A bitten-off Drukhari hand clutching a compact xenos device resembling a remote control. The stiff finger is pressing one of the two buttons.{/n}
{n}In your hand, oddly enough, is a hand. A bitten-off Drukhari hand clutching a compact xenos device resembling a remote control. The stiff finger is pressing one of the two buttons.{/n}
{n}In your hand, oddly enough, is a hand. A bitten-off Drukhari hand clutching a compact xenos device resembling a remote control. The stiff finger is pressing one of the two buttons.{/n}

languages.text: {n}奇妙なことに、あなたの手の中に、手があった。かじり取られたデュカーリの手が、リモコンに似た小さな異種族の装置を握りしめている。その硬直した指が、二つあるボタンの一つを押していた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your hand, oddly enough, is a hand. A bitten-off Drukhari hand clutching a compact xenos device resembling a remote control. The stiff finger is pressing one of the two buttons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}奇妙なことに、あなたの手の中に、手があった。かじり取られたデュカーリの手が、リモコンに似た小さな異種族の装置を握りしめている。その硬直した指が、二つあるボタンの一つを押していた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}In deiner Hand befindet sich merkwürdigerweise eine Hand. Eine abgebissene Drukhari-Hand, die ein kleines Xenos-Gerät umklammert, das an eine Fernbedienung erinnert. Der steife Finger drückt einen der zwei Knöpfe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your hand, oddly enough, is a hand. A bitten-off Drukhari hand clutching a compact xenos device resembling a remote control. The stiff finger is pressing one of the two buttons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In deiner Hand befindet sich merkwürdigerweise eine Hand. Eine abgebissene Drukhari-Hand, die ein kleines Xenos-Gerät umklammert, das an eine Fernbedienung erinnert. Der steife Finger drückt einen der zwei Knöpfe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre main s'est refermée... sur une autre main. Celle d'un Drukhari tenant ce qui semble être une télécommande xénos ornée de deux boutons. Son pouce est crispé sur l'un d'eux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your hand, oddly enough, is a hand. A bitten-off Drukhari hand clutching a compact xenos device resembling a remote control. The stiff finger is pressing one of the two buttons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre main s'est refermée... sur une autre main. Celle d'un Drukhari tenant ce qui semble être une télécommande xénos ornée de deux boutons. Son pouce est crispé sur l'un d'eux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lo que sostienes en la mano, paradójicamente, es una mano. La mano arrancada de un Drukhari, que aún aferra un dispositivo xenos parecido a un control remoto. Un dedo tieso oprime aún uno de los dos botones del aparato.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your hand, oddly enough, is a hand. A bitten-off Drukhari hand clutching a compact xenos device resembling a remote control. The stiff finger is pressing one of the two buttons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lo que sostienes en la mano, paradójicamente, es una mano. La mano arrancada de un Drukhari, que aún aferra un dispositivo xenos parecido a un control remoto. Un dedo tieso oprime aún uno de los dos botones del aparato.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你手里拿着的是另一只手。那是黑暗灵族被咬掉的手，紧紧握着某种类似于遥控器的小型异形设备，僵硬的手指按住了两个按钮中的其中一个。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your hand, oddly enough, is a hand. A bitten-off Drukhari hand clutching a compact xenos device resembling a remote control. The stiff finger is pressing one of the two buttons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你手里拿着的是另一只手。那是黑暗灵族被咬掉的手，紧紧握着某种类似于遥控器的小型异形设备，僵硬的手指按住了两个按钮中的其中一个。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elinde bir el tutuyorsun... Uzaktan kumandaya benzer kompakt bir zeno cihazını tutan, ısırılmış bir Drukhari eli... Sertleşmiş parmağıysa hâlâ iki düğmeden birine basmaya devam ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your hand, oddly enough, is a hand. A bitten-off Drukhari hand clutching a compact xenos device resembling a remote control. The stiff finger is pressing one of the two buttons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elinde, ki bu hayli tuhaf, bir el tutuyorsun. Uzaktan kumandaya benzer bir kompakt bir zeno cihazını tutan ısırılmış bir Drukhari eli... Sertleşmiş parmağıysa hâlâ iki düğmeden birine basmaya devam ediyor.{/n}
